Authors: Santhiti Vadthanarat, Olivier Raspe, Saisamorn Lumyong
Title:
Heimioporus subcostatus, a new species (Boletaceae) from
northern and northeastern Thailand
Abstract:
A novel bolete species, Heimioporus subcostatus is
described from northern and northeastern Thailand. It can be
distinguished from the other Heimioporus species by its reddish brown to
brownish red basidiomata when young becoming dull red to pale red at
maturity, with raised and prominent reticulation on stipe, yellow pores,
basidiospores with incomplete reticulation. Macroscopic and microscopic
descriptions, as well as illustrations of the new species are
presented.
